problem_data.title: Reverse Words in a String
problem_data.description:
Given an input string s, reverse the order of the words.

A word is defined as a sequence of non-space characters. The words in s will be separated by at least one space.

Return a string of the words in reverse order concatenated by a single space.

Note that s may contain leading or trailing spaces or multiple spaces between two words. The returned string should only have a single space separating the words. Do not include any extra spaces.

examples.explanation: Your reversed string should not contain leading or trailing spaces.
You need to reduce multiple spaces between two words to a single space in the reversed string.

parsed_tests: ('reverseWords', ('the sky is blue\n',), 'blue is sky the\n')
('reverseWords', ('Hello, world!  This is test.\n',), 'test. is This world! Hello,\n')
('reverseWords', ('你好 世界\n',), '世界 你好\n')
experiment_result.runlog:
[測試#1] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: reverseWords('the sky is blue\n',)
  標準輸出: 'blue is sky the\n'
  你的輸出: 'blue is sky the'

[測試#2] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: reverseWords('hello world\n',)
  標準輸出: 'world hello\n'
  你的輸出: 'world hello'

[測試#3] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: reverseWords('a   b c\n',)
  標準輸出: 'c b a\n'
  你的輸出: 'c b a'

[測試#4] ❌ 失敗
  標準輸入: reverseWords('single\n',)
  標準輸出: 'single\n'
  你的輸出: 'single'

  標準輸出: 'test. is This world! Hello,\n'
  你的輸出: 'test. is This world! Hello,'

[測試#8] ❌ 失敗

  標準輸出: '世界 你好\n'
